name: Lupa
descriptions: Lupa is a mongrel living at the Fort in 2281.
Lupa is a Legion mongrel that belongs to Antony and is the mother of many of the Legion's best dogs.
Nothin' But a Hound Dog: Lupa is among the choices of canines to retrieve a brain from for Rex. To get her brain, the player character has to talk to Antony to arrange a fight with her in the arena.
After her death in the arena, Legion troops all around the Fort mention her "dying well" in combat, considering her death an honorable one.

Frumentarii: Alerio · Cato Hostilius · Gabban · Karl · Picus · Disguised frumentarius · Ulysses (formerly)
Consul: M. Licinius Crassus · M. Scribonius Libo Drusus (of the consul)
